source.0758972f:
import spacy
from pythainlp.tag.named_entity import ThaiNameTagger
import malaya
import de_core_news_sm
import fr_core_news_sm
import es_core_news_sm
import pt_core_news_sm
import it_core_news_sm
import nl_core_news_sm
import el_core_news_sm
source.3fa2b9e9:
en_model = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")
en_docs = ["Apple is looking at buying U.K. startup for $1 billion", "I love to drive my Ferrari sports car down the streets of Los Angeles",
          "I would love to travel to Japan to visit Tokyo Disneyland"]
source.3010ebbf:
de_model = de_core_news_sm.load()
de_docs = ["Apple erwägt den Kauf eines britischen Startups für 1 Milliarde US-Dollar", "Ich liebe es, meinen Ferrari-Sportwagen durch die Straßen von Los Angeles zu fahren",
          "Ich würde gerne nach Japan reisen, um Tokyo Disneyland zu besuchen"]

fr_model = fr_core_news_sm.load()

          "J'aimerais voyager au Japon pour visiter Tokyo Disneyland"]

nl_model = nl_core_news_sm.load()
nl_docs = ["Apple overweegt om een Britse startup te kopen voor $ 1 miljard", "Ik rijd graag met mijn Ferrari-sportwagen door de straten van Los Angeles",

source.db722316:
el_model = el_core_news_sm.load()
el_docs = ["Η Apple εξετάζει την αγορά εκκίνησης στο Ηνωμένο Βασίλειο για 1 δισεκατομμύριο δολάρια", "Μου αρέσει να οδηγώ το σπορ αυτοκίνητο της Ferrari στους δρόμους του Λος Άντζελες",
          "Θα ήθελα πολύ να ταξιδέψω στην Ιαπωνία για να επισκεφτώ το Τόκιο Disneyland"]
source.1424d96c:
ms_model = malaya.entity.transformer(model = 'albert')
ms_docs = ["KUALA LUMPUR: Sempena sambutan Aidilfitri minggu depan, Perdana Menteri Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad dan Menteri Pengangkutan Anthony Loke Siew Fook menitipkan pesanan khas kepada orang ramai yang mahu pulang ke kampung halaman masing-masing. Dalam video pendek terbitan Jabatan Keselamatan Jalan Raya (JKJR) itu, Dr Mahathir menasihati mereka supaya berhenti berehat dan tidur sebentar  sekiranya mengantuk ketika memandu.",
          "Benda yg SALAH ni, jgn lah didebatkan. Yg SALAH xkan jadi betul. Ingat tu. Mcm mana kesat sekalipun org sampaikan mesej, dan memang benda tu salah, diam je. Xyah nk tunjuk kau open sangat nk tegur cara org lain berdakwah",
          "melayu bodoh, dah la gay, sokong lgbt lagi, memang tak guna"]
source.da4a8dbe:
# Multilingual Named Entities Recognition

This notebook aims to introduce some of available NER models for languages such as English, Germa, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Greek, Thai, Malay. Hope you guys find the content useful :)
